【置顶 ── 自我介绍 + 文章食用指南】
欧美圈，主要Spideypool。
１． 小说全部都是我自己亲手打的，并非翻译！！！ 只是文风特殊，拜托不要误会。
２． 禁止一切无授权转载、文包、二创、三创、引用、撷取。

Chapter 1
Chapter Text
[Pinned ── Self-Introduction + Article Reading Guidelines]
Western fandom, primarily Spideypool.
1. All of the novels are written by me, not translated! It's simply a unique writing style, so please don't misunderstand.
2. Reposting, bundling, secondary or tertiary creations, citations, or extractions without permission are strictly prohibited.
